title: A Loving Spirit
description: MR. FEBRUARYName: Michael J. Donovan.Official Status: The sexiest man on the Missouri Highway Patrol.Pitfalls To Avoid: Love and marriage.Irresistible Obstacle: Gorgeous Sabrina Sheldon--working mother, suspected drug smuggler--and all woman.Sergeant Michael Donovan thought he had living alone down to a science. Yet from the moment he caught his first tantalizing glimpse of Sabrina Sheldon, he knew their romance was destined to be. She was the most appealing female he'd ever had to stake out!But how would he convince this fiercely independent woman that they were meant for each other? Then fate stepped in-and suddenly Michael had a plan .... All it would take was a little luck, the right timing-and a generous sprinkling of an angel's good wishes!
author: Annette Broadrick
